Description: Shoulder sherd of North Ionian black-figured pottery krater or possibly dinos; interior reserved; exterior; possible remains of handle attachment at base of neck; glazed ridge at turn to shoulder; tongues at top of shoulder; below, between bands with added red bands lined in white, frieze of lions to right (front paw of one, most of body of second; much added red; fill of dots and rosettes; below, part of maeander band.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.610)
